description: Workers renovating a fountain in the Belgian city of Verviers find the organ preserved in a casket.
title: Heart of Belgian city mayor found entombed in fountain
title_page: Heart of Belgian city mayor found entombed in fountain - BBC News
maintext: The Verviers Alderman for Public Works, Maxime Degey, said "an urban legend has become reality: the casket was in the upper part of the fountain, right near the bust of Pierre David, behind a stone which we had removed during the fountain's renovation".
